query.statement: SELECT movie.movie_id, movie.title, movie.director, movie.genre_name, movie.actors, movie.release_date, movie.now_playing, movie.poster_file, movie.ticket_price FROM EXCEL_MOVIE movie

INSERT INTO EXCEL_MOVIE (movie_id, title, director, genre_name, actors, release_date, ticket_price, now_playing) VALUES (:movieId, :title, :director, :genreName, :actors, :releaseDate, :ticketPrice, 'Y')
